body_html:
@thirupalanisamy is right now travelling, but Let us discuss this separately.
Right now, we have a s390x build:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/contrib/job/tensorflow-contrib-s390x/

We can setup something similar.
TF team cannot commit to keeping it green, but the failures can be easier to track with a continuous build. Please feel free to reach out to me via email using [at]google.com

body:
@thirupalanisamy is right now travelling, but Let us discuss this separately.
Right now, we have a s390x build:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/view/contrib/job/tensorflow-contrib-s390x/

We can setup something similar.
TF team cannot commit to keeping it green, but the failures can be easier to track with a continuous build. Please feel free to reach out to me via email using <my github username>[at]google.com
